tests.name: api_file_exists
tests.description: API service file exists at correct location
tests.details: API service file found at frontend/src/services/api.js

tests.name: function_exports
tests.description: All required CRUD functions are exported
tests.details: All required functions found: getTodos, createTodo, updateTodo, deleteTodo

tests.name: error_handling
tests.details: Error handling patterns found: try, catch, throw new Error, response.ok

tests.name: input_validation
tests.details: Input validation patterns found: if (!text, if (!id, trim(), throw new Error

tests.name: async_await_pattern
tests.details: Async/await pattern used (6 async functions, 6 await calls in apiRequest)

test_notes: All CRUD functions properly exported and documented
Comprehensive error handling with try/catch blocks
Input validation for all function parameters
Async/await pattern used throughout (6 await calls in apiRequest wrapper)
JSDoc documentation complete for all functions
Base URL and headers properly configured for backend communication
